channel.title: How do I join a Beat The Clock?
channel.description: I don't know how to join a Beat The Clock, and I really want to!!

item.title: How do I join a Beat The Clock?
item.dc:creator: Osharu
item.description:
Cool! Maybe I could have new friends just because of Auxy! Lol, although, to be honest for a second, in our modern day world, it is a bit dangerous to just be talking to someone you don’t know online, because you never know who’s on the other side. I’m not saying that’s the case here, I’m just saying that we all need to be more cautious now-a-days.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I join a Beat The Clock?

item.title: How do I join a Beat The Clock?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Just keep working hard and you’ll do good alright? I’m sure you’ll be making great tracks, you just gotta push yourself to do what makes you happy.

item.title: How do I join a Beat The Clock?
item.dc:creator: Osharu
item.description:
Sounds interesting. You wouldn’t happen to have anymore tips about anything at all left for me, would you? I really appreciate all of the comments, and likes, and help and everything! It helps me with my low self-esteem.

item.title: How do I join a Beat The Clock?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Yup community driven competitions never a bad idea either good way to meet up with people too and find new buddies (some of the people I regularly talk to were found through a comp)

Read full topic
item.source: How do I join a Beat The Clock?

item.title: How do I join a Beat The Clock?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
If you’re really looking for a competition, there’s currently weekly remix competitions being hosted on Auxy Discord chat, currently they’re holding a remix competition for Wave Racer, Fantom 87 and Zeph’s collab song. I’d love to see more people entering as it’s an amazing song. It’s also the closest thing we have to BTC atm.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I join a Beat The Clock?

item.title: How do I join a Beat The Clock?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Usually someone is selected to host them, it’s released on a Friday and you have all weekend to submit your entry. Then some time on Monday the host goes through all entries and then makes a shortlist of the top tracks.

There’s hasn’t been one of these in awhile! No one is sure what the status is (or, mums the word lol)

Read full topic
